KnowledgeBase.Title: objectToList
KnowledgeBase.ArgumentTypes: Vector NumVector List Pair Structure Dictionary

Function.Description: The objectToList function converts the object into a list returning the new list.

Brief.Overview: The objectToList function converts the object {object} into a list returning the new list. The {object} may be either a Vector, a Dictionary, a Structure, or a Range. If the object is already a List, it is returned unchanged. Any other type of object is returned as a List containing a singleton.
Brief.Usage: The objectToList function is used to coerce an object into a List (of Pairs).

Argument.Name: obj
Argument.Note: Any other object except the ones specified will return a List containing a singleton.

Syntax.Return: A List created from the object argument
